section.title: (PROFILE CUSTOMIZATION) - additions to suid_whitelist
section.para: This module allows the profile to contain specific executables that should be added to /var/lib/oslockdown/files/suid_whitelist file processing when this profile is run. The additions are transient, and will not persist past the execution of the profile.

listitem.para:
Additional SUID executables (one per line)
This allows for Profile specific executables that are allowed to have the SUID bit set. There should be one executable per line.
